name: eye_details_observation_flat
title: Flat view definition for Eye Details Observation resource
description: A flattened view of Observation resources specifically for Eye Clinic Examinations, extracting core details and eye-specific extensions.

column.name: id
column.description: The logical ID of the Observation resource.

column.name: status
column.description: The status of the Observation (e.g., final, preliminary).

column.name: patient_id
column.description: The ID of the Patient subject.

column.name: encounter_id
column.description: The ID of the Encounter context.

column.name: effective_date_time
column.description: The date and time the observation was made.

column.name: ext_eye_refracted
column.description: Extension (Eye): Indicates if the eye was refracted.

column.name: ext_eye_spectacles_prescribed
column.description: Extension (Eye): Indicates if spectacles were prescribed.

column.name: ext_eye_spectacle_dispensed
column.description: Extension (Eye): Indicates if spectacles were dispensed.

column.name: ext_eye_contact_lense_dispensed
column.description: Extension (Eye): Indicates if contact lenses were dispensed.

column.name: ext_eye_diagnosed_with_low_vision_I
column.description: Extension (Eye): Indicates if diagnosed with a low vision device I.

column.name: ext_eye_diagnosed_with_low_vision_II
column.description: Extension (Eye): Indicates if diagnosed with a low vision device II.

column.name: ext_eye_is_dispensed_with_low_vision_device
column.description: Extension (Eye): Indicates if a low vision device was dispensed.
